titles.title: We walk in the heavenlies with Jesus,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We walk in the heavenlies with Jesus,
All earthly cares are laid aside;
We're seated at the right hand of the Father,
All authority and power is ours.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So set your affection on things from above,
With Christ at the right hand of God,
For ye are dead and your new life is hid
With Christ at the right hand of God.
